__inputs.description: Prometheus or Mimir DS can be selected on import

description: CollectD & Prometheus Server Metrics (CPU, Memory, IO, Disks)

panels.description: Total uptime for all selected servers
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Users logged in for all selected servers for selected time range
panels.title: Logged users

panels.description: Load average for all selected servers for selected time range
panels.title: Load Avg (5m)

panels.description: Zombies for all selected servers for selected time range
panels.title: Zombies

panels.description: Running procs for all selected servers for selected time range
panels.title: Procs run

panels.description: Blocked procs for all selected servers for selected time range
panels.title: Procs blocked

panels.description: CPU usage average for all selected servers for selected time range

targets.legendFormat: CPU usage for all selected servers for selected time range

panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: RAM usage for all selected servers for selected time range (not average!)
panels.title: RAM Usage

panels.description: SWAP usage for all selected servers for selected time range (not average!)
panels.title: SWAP Usage

panels.description: Disk usage (only root fs) for all selected servers for selected time range (not average!)
panels.title: Disk Usage

panels.description: Disk Inodes usage (only root fs) for all selected servers for selected time range (not average!)
panels.title: Disk Inodes (root)

panels.description: Disk usage (only root fs) for all selected servers for selected time range (not average!)

targets.expr: sum by(type) (collectd_df_percent_bytes{exported_instance=~"$server", df="root"}) / count by(type) (collectd_df_percent_bytes{exported_instance=~"$server", df="root"})

panels.title: Disk Usage

panels.description: Shows temperature in Celsius and fan speed in r/min
panels.title: Temperature / Fan

title: Server Overview - (CollectD/Prometheus) [release 2.0.4]
